api/B.Parser.html.title: Class Parser
api/B.Parser.html.summary: Class Parser Namespace B Assembly BOOSEproject.dll Lightweight parser used by the application to convert textual BOOSE programs into command objects consumed by BOOSE.StoredProgram. public class Parser : IParser Inheritance object Parser Implements IParser Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Remarks This implementation is intentionally minimal / partial. Update ParseProgram(string) and ParseCommand(string) with real parsing logic to obtain full behaviour. Methods ParseCommand(string) Parses a single command text and returns an BOOSE.ICommand instance representing it. public ICommand ParseCommand(string command) Parameters command string Textual command (for example: "circle 10"). Returns ICommand An object implementing BOOSE.ICommand for the parsed command. Returns null when the command could not be parsed (current implementation returns null). Remarks Implement parsing of command name, parameters and selection/creation of the appropriate concrete command type (for example AppCircle, AppRectangle). ParseProgram(string) Parses an entire program text into internal command representations and stores them into the BOOSE.StoredProgram instance passed to the parser (consumer-side). public void ParseProgram(string code) Parameters code string Program source text. Lines are typically separated by newline characters and tokens are whitespace separated. Remarks Current implementation is a no-op. Implement tokenization and command creation here.

api/B.html.title: Namespace B
api/B.html.summary: Namespace B Classes Parser Lightweight parser used by the application to convert textual BOOSE programs into command objects consumed by BOOSE.StoredProgram.

api/BOOSE.StoredProgramException.html.title: Class StoredProgramException
api/BOOSE.StoredProgramException.html.summary: Class StoredProgramException Namespace BOOSE Assembly BOOSEproject.dll Exception type thrown for errors related to the stored program execution or management. public class StoredProgramException : Exception, ISerializable Inheritance object Exception StoredProgramException Implements ISerializable Inherited Members Exception.GetBaseException() Exception.GetType() Exception.ToString() Exception.Data Exception.HelpLink Exception.HResult Exception.InnerException Exception.Message Exception.Source Exception.StackTrace Exception.TargetSite Exception.SerializeObjectState object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Constructors StoredProgramException() Initializes a new instance of the StoredProgramException class with no message. public StoredProgramException() StoredProgramException(string) Initializes a new instance of the StoredProgramException class with a specified error message. public StoredProgramException(string message) Parameters message string The error message describing the reason for the exception.

api/BOOSETests.CanvasCommandTests.html.title: Class CanvasCommandTests
api/BOOSETests.CanvasCommandTests.html.summary: Class CanvasCommandTests Namespace BOOSETests Assembly BOOSETests.dll Unit tests that exercise drawing commands on the application's canvas implementation. Tests use reflection to instantiate the internal BOOSEproject.IAppCanvas type so production code does not need to be modified for testing. [TestClass] public class CanvasCommandTests Inheritance object CanvasCommandTests Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Methods CreateCanvas(int, int) Helper that constructs an instance of the internal canvas type from the production assembly. private (Type canvasType, object canvasInstance) CreateCanvas(int width = 800, int height = 600) Parameters width int Requested canvas width in pixels (default 800). height int Requested canvas height in pixels (default 600). Returns (Type canvasType, object canvasInstance) A tuple containing the runtime Type of the canvas and the created instance object. Exceptions TypeLoadException Thrown if the internal canvas type cannot be found in the assembly. DrawTo_Sets_PenPosition_Correctly() Verifies that calling DrawTo(x, y) draws a line and updates the canvas cursor coordinates. [TestMethod] public void DrawTo_Sets_PenPosition_Correctly() MoveTo_Sets_PenPosition_Correctly() Verifies that calling MoveTo(x, y) updates the canvas cursor coordinates (Xpos/Ypos). [TestMethod] public void MoveTo_Sets_PenPosition_Correctly() MultilineSequence_Executes_Commands_And_UpdatesState() Executes a short multiline drawing sequence (MoveTo, Circle, Rect, DrawTo) and asserts final state. Confirms the canvas bitmap is available after drawing operations. [TestMethod] public void MultilineSequence_Executes_Commands_And_UpdatesState()

api/BOOSETests.html.title: Namespace BOOSETests
api/BOOSETests.html.summary: Namespace BOOSETests Classes CanvasCommandTests Unit tests that exercise drawing commands on the application's canvas implementation. Tests use reflection to instantiate the internal BOOSEproject.IAppCanvas type so production code does not need to be modified for testing.

api/BOOSEproject.AppCircle.html.title: Class AppCircle
api/BOOSEproject.AppCircle.html.summary: Class AppCircle Namespace BOOSEproject Assembly BOOSEproject.dll Command implementation that draws a circle on the canvas using a single integer parameter (radius). internal class AppCircle : CommandOneParameter, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter AppCircle Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CommandOneParameter.CheckParameters(string[]) CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Remarks This command reads its parameter(s) from the base BOOSE.CommandOneParameter implementation during Execute(). Validation for non-integer and negative values is performed and reported using BOOSE.CanvasException. Constructors AppCircle() Initializes a new instance of the AppCircle class. public AppCircle() AppCircle(Canvas, int) Initializes a new instance of the AppCircle class with the specified canvas and radius. public AppCircle(Canvas c, int radius) Parameters c Canvas Canvas used to draw the circle. radius int Initial radius value. Fields radius Circle radius (populated during Execute() from parsed parameters). private int radius Field Value int Methods Execute() Executes the circle command: validates the parsed parameter and draws the circle on the canvas. public override void Execute() Exceptions CanvasException Thrown when the radius parameter is non-integer or negative.

api/BOOSEproject.AppCommandFactory.html.title: Class AppCommandFactory
api/BOOSEproject.AppCommandFactory.html.summary: Class AppCommandFactory Namespace BOOSEproject Assembly BOOSEproject.dll Application-specific command factory that produces concrete BOOSE.ICommand instances used by the parser and program runner. internal class AppCommandFactory : CommandFactory, ICommandFactory Inheritance object CommandFactory AppCommandFactory Implements ICommandFactory Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Methods MakeCommand(string) Creates a command instance for the provided command type name. public override ICommand MakeCommand(string commandtype) Parameters commandtype string The textual command identifier (for example "circle" or "rectangle"). Returns ICommand A concrete BOOSE.ICommand implementation for the requested command type, or the result of base.MakeCommand(commandtype) when the command type is not handled here. Remarks This factory recognizes application-specific command names and returns corresponding command objects. Unknown command types are delegated to the base factory implementation.

api/BOOSEproject.AppMoveTo.html.title: Class AppMoveTo
api/BOOSEproject.AppMoveTo.html.summary: Class AppMoveTo Namespace BOOSEproject Assembly BOOSEproject.dll Command implementation that moves the drawing cursor to a specified (X, Y) position. internal class AppMoveTo : CommandTwoParameters, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter CommandTwoParameters AppMoveTo Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandTwoParameters.param2 CommandTwoParameters.param2unprocessed CommandTwoParameters.CheckParameters(string[]) CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Remarks This command expects two integer parameters. Validation is performed in Execute() to ensure parameters are integers and within allowed bounds before calling canvas.MoveTo. Constructors AppMoveTo() Initializes a new instance of the AppMoveTo class. public AppMoveTo() AppMoveTo(int, int) Initializes a new instance of the AppMoveTo class with explicit coordinates. public AppMoveTo(int X, int Y) Parameters X int Initial X coordinate. Y int Initial Y coordinate. Fields X Destination X coordinate (populated during Execute()). private int X Field Value int Y Destination Y coordinate (populated during Execute()). private int Y Field Value int Methods Execute() Executes the MoveTo command: validates parameter types and bounds, then updates the canvas cursor. public override void Execute() Exceptions CanvasException Thrown when parameters are non-integer or out of the allowed canvas bounds.

api/BOOSEproject.AppRectangle.html.title: Class AppRectangle
api/BOOSEproject.AppRectangle.html.summary: Class AppRectangle Namespace BOOSEproject Assembly BOOSEproject.dll Command implementation that draws a rectangle on the canvas using two integer parameters (width, height). internal class AppRectangle : CommandTwoParameters, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter CommandTwoParameters AppRectangle Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandTwoParameters.param2 CommandTwoParameters.param2unprocessed CommandTwoParameters.CheckParameters(string[]) CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Constructors AppRectangle() Initializes a new instance of the AppRectangle class. public AppRectangle() AppRectangle(Canvas, int, int) Initializes a new instance of the AppRectangle class with the specified canvas and dimensions. public AppRectangle(Canvas c, int width, int height) Parameters c Canvas Canvas to draw to. width int Rectangle width. height int Rectangle height. Fields height Rectangle height (populated during Execute() from parsed parameters). private int height Field Value int width Rectangle width (populated during Execute() from parsed parameters). private int width Field Value int Methods Execute() Executes the rectangle command: validates parameters and draws the rectangle on the canvas. public override void Execute() Exceptions CanvasException Thrown when parameters are non-integer, negative, or otherwise invalid.

Field Value IContainer Methods BTN_Run_Click(object, EventArgs) Click handler for the Run button. Parses the input program and executes it. Any parser or runtime exceptions are caught and written to the output textbox. private void BTN_Run_Click(object sender, EventArgs e) Parameters sender object Event source (the Run button). e EventArgs Event arguments. Dispose(bool) Clean up any resources being used. protected override void Dispose(bool disposing) Parameters disposing bool true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false. Form1_Paint(object, PaintEventArgs) Paint event handler for the form. Copies the current canvas bitmap into the picture box. private void Form1_Paint(object sender, PaintEventArgs e) Parameters sender object Event source (the form). e PaintEventArgs Paint event arguments containing graphics context. InitializeComponent() Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor. private void InitializeComponent() OutputTextBox_TextChanged(object, EventArgs) Handler for changes in the output textbox content. api/BOOSEproject.IAppCanvas.html.title: Class IAppCanvas
api/BOOSEproject.IAppCanvas.html.summary: Class IAppCanvas Namespace BOOSEproject Assembly BOOSEproject.dll Application canvas implementation used by the program for all drawing operations. Implements the BOOSE.ICanvas interface expected by command objects. internal class IAppCanvas : ICanvas Inheritance object IAppCanvas Implements ICanvas Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Remarks This class wraps a Bitmap and Graphics instance to draw shapes and text. It stores the current pen/cursor position in Xpos and Ypos. Constructors IAppCanvas(int, int) Initializes a new instance of the IAppCanvas class with the given size. public IAppCanvas(int Xsize, int Ysize) Parameters Xsize int Canvas width in pixels. Ysize int Canvas height in pixels. Fields CanvasBitmap private Bitmap CanvasBitmap Field Value Bitmap Pen private Pen Pen Field Value Pen g private Graphics g Field Value Graphics Properties PenColour Colour / pen selection placeholder property. public object PenColour { get; set; } Property Value object Xpos Current X cursor position on the canvas. public int Xpos { get; set; } Property Value int Ypos Current Y cursor position on the canvas. public int Ypos { get; set; } Property Value int Methods Circle(int, bool) Draws a circle of the specified radius at the current cursor position. public void Circle(int radius, bool filled) Parameters radius int Circle radius in pixels. filled bool When true the circle should be filled. (Current implementation draws outline.) Clear() Clears the canvas by filling it with white. public void Clear() DrawTo(int, int) Draws a line from the current cursor position to the provided point, then updates the cursor. public void DrawTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int Destination X coordinate. y int Destination Y coordinate. IParser() (Placeholder) method retained to match an expected interface in the project. public void IParser() MoveTo(int, int) Moves the current cursor to the specified point without drawing. public void MoveTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int Destination X coordinate. y int Destination Y coordinate. Program(string, ICanvas) (Placeholder) method retained to match an expected interface in the project. public void Program(string code, ICanvas canvas) Parameters code string canvas ICanvas Rect(int, int, bool) Draws a rectangle with the provided width and height using the current cursor as origin. public void Rect(int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters width int Rectangle width in pixels. height int Rectangle height in pixels. filled bool When true the rectangle should be filled. (Current implementation draws outline.) Reset() Resets the cursor position to a default location. public void Reset() Set(int, int) Sets the canvas size / internal state. Not implemented. public void Set(int xsize, int ysize) Parameters xsize int New width in pixels. ysize int New height in pixels. SetColour(int, int, int) Sets the drawing pen colour using RGB components. public void SetColour(int red, int green, int blue) Parameters red int Red component (0-255). green int Green component (0-255). blue int Blue component (0-255). StoredProgram() (Placeholder) method retained to match an expected interface in the project. public void StoredProgram() Tri(int, int) Draws a triangle using the current cursor position as the top vertex. public void Tri(int width, int height) Parameters width int Width of the triangle's base. height int Height of the triangle. WriteText(string) Writes text on the canvas at the current cursor position. public void WriteText(string text) Parameters text string Text to draw. getBitmap() Returns the underlying Bitmap used for rendering. public object getBitmap() Returns object A bitmap object representing the current canvas image.

api/BOOSEproject.html.title: Namespace BOOSEproject
api/BOOSEproject.html.summary: Namespace BOOSEproject Classes AppCircle Command implementation that draws a circle on the canvas using a single integer parameter (radius). AppCommandFactory Application-specific command factory that produces concrete BOOSE.ICommand instances used by the parser and program runner. AppMoveTo Command implementation that moves the drawing cursor to a specified (X, Y) position. AppRectangle Command implementation that draws a rectangle on the canvas using two integer parameters (width, height). ApplicationConfiguration Bootstrap the application configuration. Form1 Main application form that hosts the BOOSE canvas, parser, program store and command factory. Provides UI entry point to parse and run BOOSE programs and renders canvas output. IAppCanvas Application canvas implementation used by the program for all drawing operations. Implements the BOOSE.ICanvas interface expected by command objects. Program
